5 'LeftROT RightROT
6 'Use Left and Right Cursorkeys
10 LET[0],8968,17240,6210,17943,14088,8961,9728,9479,8192,8455,6985,23636,16628,16412,16556,17184,7789,54774,21944,7286,11784,53744,9472,23928,21840,7277,11528,53754,18288
20 LET[29],8968,17240,6210,17943,14088,8961,9735,9472,8192,23892,16628,16412,16556,17184,7277,11528,53751,9223,7076,21816,7798,54768,9472,23928,21840,7277,11528,53754,18288
25 CLS:J=#EF:CLP
30 FORX=7TO0STEP-2
35 FORY=0TO5STEP2
40 LCX+11,Y+8:?CHR$(J);
45 NEXT
50 NEXT
55 K=INKEY():IF K=28 Z=USR(#800,J) ELSEIF K=29 Z=USR(#83A,J)
60 GOTO55
